functions.def: function supportsInterface(bytes4 interfaceID) external view returns (bool) {

extracted.semantic_return:
It returns whether the contract claims to support a given interface ID.

- Returns true only if interfaceID is:
  - 0x01ffc9a7: ERC‑165 (supportsInterface)
  - 0x4e2312e0: ERC‑1155 token receiver (onERC1155Received and onERC1155BatchReceived)
- Returns false for any other interface ID.

extract_debug.semantic_return:
